description: This file contains a Python test class 'MultilibTest' that extends 'OERuntimeTestCase'. It defines methods to verify multilib support on a system by checking ELF class of binaries, utilizing subprocesses and custom decorators for dependencies and package checks. The class includes tests for verifying 32-bit and 64-bit libc availability and the 'connmand' binary. It imports various modules related to runtime testing, decorators, and subprocess execution.

classes.name: MultilibTest
classes.description: Test class for verifying multilib support, subclassing OERuntimeTestCase.

methods.name: archtest(self, binary, arch)
methods.description: Checks if a given binary has the ELF class specified by 'arch' (e.g., ELF32 or ELF64). Copies binary to a test location, runs 'readelf', parses output, and asserts correctness.

methods.name: test_check_multilib_libc(self)
methods.description: Verifies that both 32-bit and 64-bit libc are present in a multilib image, dependent on specific system data variables and packages.

methods.name: test_file_connman(self)
methods.description: Checks if the 'connmand' binary is 32-bit ELF.
